name: Keith World (2019)
description:
One day, Keith was relaxing on Explorer's Island when his brother Wyatt told him about the legend of a mysterious portal hidden in the caverns of the island. So, the two set out to find it...and what do you know? They did! The portal transported them to a new world, ready to be explored. And so the adventure began...

Explore the city for gems and coins to unlock new costumes and an underground maze!
